summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Optic Shop Pro-Moisture Chamber With Elastic Head Band - Size Small
Review Date: 2016/10/12
Store: Optic Shop
Product Description: ['Small PRO-MOISTURE CHAMBER WITH ELASTIC HEAD BAND - White Foam. One Elastic Chamber. Ideal for dry-eye conditions. Clear vinyl shield with soft sponge edging that gently hugs facial contours. Product dimensions: 40mm vertical, 60mm Horizontal. Combat miserable dry eye conditions with the Pro-Moisture Chamber with Elastic Head Band from Optic Shop. Clear vinyl shielding offers ideal eye protection. Inner lining of soft sponge material hugs the contours of the face and provides hours of comfortable wear. Comes with comfortable elastic head band, and fits both the left and right eyes. Size Small and package quantity of 1.']
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Color': 'White', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Fabric Type': 'Foam', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.2 x 2.36 x 1.57 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': '144SB', 'Date First Available': 'May 20, 2015', 'Manufacturer': 'Optic Shop'}
Review Text: I bought this when I had a bout of bells palsy and I wish I wouldn't have wasted the money. I didn't really use it even though it was a great idea it was just uncomfortable and kept fogging up. The foam around it is rough and hurt the soft skin around my eye. The strap I found to be fine once I tied it off to fit me. I still have it and if I ever have another bout of BP I might glue or somehow put some soft fabric around it. Won't fix the fogging up but it might make it feel a little more comfortable. Don't have anything to lose. I wouldn't wear it like it is.
Review Title: Great idea....
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Butecare Eyelash Growth Enhancer & Brow Serum for Long - Amazon Vine
Review Date: 2018/11/01
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.5 x 0.9 x 0.9 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
Review Text: Didn't work at all for me. Plus I was really worried about what would happen if it got into my eyes. They made it clear to NOT get it on your eyelids because it doesn't need to go into your eyes. That worries me because I know no matter how careful I am there's probably going to some that will drip down into my eye. Anything that's going on or around my eyes shouldn't be toxic. And maybe they only say that as a precaution and it wouldn't hurt your eye but I don't like to take chances with my eyes.
Review Title: No luck for me
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Anti-Aging Hydrating Serum with Natural Mango Micro-beads, Vitamins E and C, Natural and Organic Plant Extracts, Paraben-Free, 30 ml, Made in France, Phytema
Review Date: 2018/11/25
Store: PHYTEMA
Product Description: ['Anti-Aging Hydrating Serum with Natural Mango Micro-beads, Vitamins E and C, Natural and Organic Plant Extracts, Paraben-Free, 30 ml, Made in France, Phytema']
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'PHYTEMA', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural', 'Item Volume': '30 Milliliters', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 1.4 x 1.4 inches; 4.23 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'PHYTEMA'}
Review Text: I've had some splotchy acne here and there. Not like teenage acne but I get little flesh colored bumps in certain areas/patches on my face and neck. I started thinking maybe I had too much bacteria on my face even though I wash it everyday but decided to use dial soap on it. That wasn't helping at all. I heard that serums are really good on your face and if your face isn't well moisturized it will produce more sebum which in turns can cause more acne. This stuff has been great! It's not completely gone but it's a lot better. I didn't take any pictures cause since they were flesh colored you could hardly see them especially in a photo. I feel like my skin glows a little better since I've been using this too. I was afraid "vit C" would break me out cause of the acids but Apparently it's the opposite. Those acids are good for your skin. I would certainly recommend this!
Review Title: Helped my acne
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: AuroTrends Makeup Remover Towel,2 Pack Reusable Chemical-free Microfiber Makeup Remover Cloths,Magically and Gently Wipe Away Cosmetics,Sunscreen,Oil and Dirt,Set of 2 (Pink+Black)
Review Date: 2018/12/01
Store: AuroTrends
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'AuroTrends', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '2.0 Count', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 2.72 x 1.42 inches; 6.4 Ounces'}
Review Text: This is so soft! It worked great but I don't use a lot of makeup. Just some pressed powder and eye line. I don't know how it would take off liquid and mascara. I like it just as a face washcloth for anytime. It's really soft. My 6 yr daughter really liked it too and wants one to wash her face with since we do that every morning.
Review Title: Very soft
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 8Pcs Limit Comb Universal Hair Clipper Limit Comb Guide Attachment Size Barber Replacement
Review Date: 2020/07/05
Store: huanban072
Product Description: ['Description:  Features: 100% brand new and high quality Great for adding additional length and styles during your grooming, clipping, and trimming experience. Great for human hair as well. These easy to attach guide combs are a great accessory to meet your dog, cat, pets grooming needs. Fits standard adjustable clipper blades. Necessary tool for haircutting and hairdressing. Made of PP material, durable and easy to attach. Includes: 8 plastic attachment guide combs: 1/8’’, 1/4’’, 3/8’’, 1/2’’, 5/8’’, 3/4’’, 7/8’’, 1’’, left and right ear.  Specification: Material: PP Plastic Color: Black Quantity: 1 set(8pcs)  Note: Transition: 1cm=10mm=0.39inch No retail package. Please allow 1-3mm error due to manual measurement. pls make sure you do not mind before you bid. Due to the difference between different monitors, the picture may not reflect the actual color of the item. Thank you!  Package includes: 1 set(8pcs) x Limit Combs(other accessories demo in the picture is not included.)']
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Material': 'PP Plastic', 'Brand': 'huanban072', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Black', 'Number of Items': '8', 'UPC': '773050877365', 'Manufacturer': 'huanban072'}
Review Text: Great price and work great!
Review Title: Work great!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: AUGNORYE 13 Pcs Hair Cutting Scissors Kit, Professional Hair Barber Scissors Kit with Thinning Shears, Home Hair Shears for Women, Men, Kids
Review Date: 2020/08/11
Store: AUGNORYE
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'AUGNORYE', 'Included Components': 'Scissors', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel'}
Review Text: I don't get why the capes are such crap in the these sets. Whether it's an electric razor set or scissors, they are always cheap mess no matter the brand! That's my only complaint. I had to buy a separate cape which was annoying but the scissors, combs and clips are nice! Good value!
Review Title: Great set except for the cape
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Glass Nail File - JORLAI 2PC Nano Nail Shiner Nail Files Polisher Glass Nail Buffers Professional Crystal Manicure Tools Kit for Natural Nails
Review Date: 2020/09/01
Store: JORLAI
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.2 x 2.5 x 0.4 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '712322500167'}
Review Text: These are adorable and my 8 year old loves them but they don't work well. One side is just for looks and the other is a file but it just doesn't work well for us. We keep short nails and maybe that's why but I certainly wouldn't buy these.
Review Title: Cute! But not really practical
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Nxconsu 8Pcs Rhinestone Headbands for Women Girls Teens Kids Fashion Comfort No Hurting Hair Accessories Thin Hair Bands Crystal Exquisite Color Selection
Review Date: 2020/10/13
Store: Nxconsu
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Age Range (Description)': 'Child', 'Occasion': 'Wedding, Birthday', 'Material': 'Silk, Cotton', 'Fabric Type': 'Rhinestone', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '8.15 x 6.77 x 1.54 inches; 8.5 Ounces'}
Review Text: With that being said, they are great otherwise! They feel good and me or my 8 yr old daughter can wear them. Love how there's so many colors and good colors. One or any outfit we have!
Review Title: One arrived broken
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:  
The user had notable positive experiences with certain products. They expressed satisfaction with skin care items, highlighting significant improvements in skin condition and overall appearance. Softness was appreciated in a reusable makeup remover, which both the user and their child found enjoyable for daily use. Additionally, the affordability and functionality of hair clipper attachments received praise, indicating a positive sentiment toward value for money. A hair scissors kit was acknowledged for its usefulness, despite minor concerns regarding other components. The variety and comfort of fashion accessories were also well-received by both the user and their daughter.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:  
Several negative experiences were reported, primarily concerning comfort and effectiveness. One product was deemed uncomfortable due to a rough design, leading to dissatisfaction despite its potential benefits. A lash growth serum raised safety concerns due to the risk of irritation, resulting in a lack of trust. Similarly, a nail file set was criticized for its impracticality, as it failed to perform adequately. The quality of included capes in grooming kits was consistently noted as subpar, frustrating the user. Further disappointment was expressed regarding a hair accessory that arrived damaged, highlighting concerns about quality assurance.

OVERALL SUMMARY:  
The user's shopping experiences reflect a mix of satisfaction and frustration. Positive aspects include effective skin care solutions, comforting accessories, and value-rated grooming tools. However, significant dissatisfaction arose from issues of comfort, product effectiveness, and quality concerns, particularly regarding safety with eye-care products. The user’s feedback suggests that while some items provide favorable results and value, certain products failed to meet expectations, leading to mixed feelings regarding future purchases. Overall, the user has a balanced view informed by both commendable and disappointing product interactions.

target_interaction.title: Great for traveling
target_interaction.text:
I ordered this because I have a couple teeth that food gets stuck in a LOT and it's super annoying. I was using those picks but not only are they expensive BUT I noticed some of the plastic on it would be gone after using it on my teeth. Where was the plastic going? It was there and now it's not so it must be in my mouth! We do NOT need to be swallowing any more plastic!! I have a regular water pick and tooth brush combo but saw this and thought it would be GREAT travel with! Comes with a nice little bag to put it in which is nice because once you put water in it, unless you take it apart, there will be some water left in there. I squirt out as much as I can when I'm done but it's not totally cleaned out. That being said I think it's probably wise after a couple of months at least if not sooner you should maybe run some vinegar through it to clean it really well. I did that to start with to clean it before I used it.

As for the settings.... I would like if there were more than 3 but for a travel one I'm OK with it only being 3. As another reviewer said, you DO need to make sure the light is lit on the setting you want to start off with. I'm used to using a water pick so I like it up pretty high but you may not! If you're new start low.
I can get through all of my teeth in my water tank but I have to go fast. If I've had some sticky stuff I may have to fill it back up again for a second go round. I saw some bigger ones but I like how this one is a little smaller. It does it's job.
I don't have a problem with cleaning mine after each go round. Someone mentioned cleaning it after each time. I just wipe it off with my hand towel. It's water that came out of my mouth. I have my own hand towel that no one else uses and it's my spit and I wash my hands afterwards so I don't feel it needs to be sanitized all the time. Maybe if you were sharing it but this is mine!

I really like how you can charge it in any USB adapter. Super convenient these days.

It comes with several pieces. For the normal water picker to blow stuff from your teeth then there's plenty for others in the family or if you just want to use another while one is drying from being cleaned or something. I haven't used the tongue piece yet. I have a tongue scraper I'm fond of so this doesn't appeal to me.
I do really recommend this!
